actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the protection of Palmer's Chapel within the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to continue to protect Palmer's Chapel within the Great Smoky Mountains National Park. Authorizes the Secretary to make arrangements to communicate the history of the chapel to park visitors and to allow memorial services for the former residents and their descendants.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the protection of Palmer's Chapel within the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, and for other purposes.
